document.full_text: productions include "king lear," starring sam waterston, as well as new works by mike daisey, nathan englander, david henry hwang, richard nelson, and stew and heidi rodewald.
document.title: public theater unveils its 2011-2012 season
lines_and_colors: productions include "king lear," starring sam waterston, as well as new works by mike daisey, nathan englander, david henry hwang, richard nelson, and stew and heidi rodewald.
